data.text:
Ray MacDonald, r.i.p. (All My Children)

by Silver_Surfer1 » Fri Jul 2, '21, 1:47 am

Actor Ray MacDonald has passed away. He was 93. He played the role of Patriarch Joe Martin on the daytime soap opera "All My Children" for almost 40 years or so. He also made many appearances in other tv shows, movies, etc.

Condolences to his family. :rip:

https://people.com/tv/ray-macdonnell-or ... i-tribute/

Happy 27th Anniversary Fringes Of Algo

~ Founded April 01, 1997 ~

"For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life." John 3:16
